Posts.Content: On 9/9/2008 mossrose wrote: 36 years ago I had breast cancer at the age of 32. I have always been atune to my body for that reason Now, I have had a sore nipple and breast discomfort for some time. No discharge, but a rash at times with a scaly look. No lumps, so I am told there is nothing wrong. My gut says otherwise.  There is a strong genetic link to breast cancer in the family. Has anyone else every experienced this?  Hi I know your concern   , follow your mind , and I pray for you that it is nothing.....let me know
Posts.Title: After 36 years, I'm worried again
